"If we summon what is best in us, with our feet planted firmly in today but our eyes cast towards tomorrow; I know it’s within reach" #SOTU
"But for more than two hundred years, we have put those things aside and placed our collective shoulder to the wheel of progress" #SOTU
"Our freedom, our democracy, has never been easy.  Sometimes we stumble; we make mistakes; we get frustrated or discouraged." #SOTU
"Let’s remember that our leadership is defined not just by our defense against threats, but by the enormous opportunities to do good" #SOTU
"Together with our allies, we will complete our mission there by the end of this year, & America’s longest war will finally be over." #SOTU
"It should be the power of our vote, not the size of our bank account, that drives our democracy." #SOTU
"Citizenship means standing up for everyone’s right to vote" #SOTU
"That’s what health insurance reform is all about – the peace of mind that if misfortune strikes, you don’t have to lose everything." #SOTU
"So join the rest of the country.  Say yes.  Give America a raise." #SOTU
"Because if you cook our troops’ meals or wash their dishes, you shouldn’t have to live in poverty." #SOTU
"Let's all come together: Congress, the WH, & business from Wall Street to Main Street; give every woman the opportunity she deserves" #SOTU
"The problem is we’re still not reaching enough kids, and we’re not reaching them in time.  That has to change" #SOTU
"We are stronger when America fields a full team." #SOTU
"First, this Congress needs to restore the unemployment insurance you just let expire for 1.6 million people." #SOTU
"In this rapidly-changing economy, we have to make sure that every American has the skills to fill those jobs." #SOTU
"Taken together, our energy policy is creating jobs and leading to a cleaner, safer planet." #SOTU
"Today America is closer to energy independence than we’ve been in decades." #SOTU
"China and Europe aren’t standing on the sidelines.  Neither should we." #SOTU
"Let’s do more to help the entrepreneurs and small business owners who create most new jobs in America" #SOTU
"We also have the chance, right now, to beat other countries in the race for the next wave of high-tech manufacturing jobs." #SOTU
"Opportunity is who we are.  And the defining project of our generation is to restore that promise." #SOTUpic.twitter.com/4uTnPiRJgY
"There are millions of Americans outside Washington who are tired of stale political arguments, and are moving this country forward." #SOTU
"Across the country, we’re partnering with mayors, governors, and state legislatures on issues from homelessness to marriage equality" #SOTU
"What I offer tonight is a set of concrete, practical proposals to speed up growth, strengthen the middle class" #SOTU
"As President, I’m committed to making Washington work better, and rebuilding the trust of the people who sent us here." #SOTU
"When our differences shut down government...we are not doing right by the American people." #SOTU
"That’s why I believe this can be a breakthrough year for America." #SOTU
"Tonight this chamber speaks with one voice to the people we represent: it's you our citizens, who make the state of our union strong" #SOTU
